attributes.action: Amend the voting slips so that the electorate can cast a vote for a party that has no representation in their area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having no choice of political party's (invariably only Labour, Conservative or Liberal Democrates with more or less identical policies)in some areas leads to stale politics and can hardly be considered democratic. In the alternative, include a box in the ballot papers to tick 'None of the Above'.
